Convert summarised quantiles from wide to long format

Source: R/postprocess.R
quantiles_to_long.Rd

Convert summarised quantiles from wide to long format

quantiles_to_long(posterior)

Arguments

posterior

A dataframe as output by fv_tidy_posterior(), fv_extract_forecast(), etc.

Value

A data frame of quantiles in long format.

See also

Functions used for postprocessing of model fits convert_to_stanfit(), extract_draws(), extract_forecast_dates(), fv_extract_forecast(), fv_posterior(), fv_tidy_posterior(), link_dates_with_posterior(), link_obs_with_posterior(), update_voc_label()

Examples

posterior <- fv_example(strains = 2, type = "posterior")
long_posterior <- quantiles_to_long(posterior)
long_posterior
